column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////The bad:  tuna tar tare was over loaded with bitter cilantro.  The pork chop was terrible
column5: over cooked.  The lamb chops were the same
column9: the texture was just weird.  The lamb sauce was terribly salty.  Our server Amy was nice but always came to the table and talked abruptly instead of pausing for just a moment for us to give her our attention.  The corn was over powered by a heavy mayonnaise-like sauce.  With entree prices at $30-60
column10: it was a really poor experience.
